targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "PortQ" WHERE "type" = 'qls' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortQ
SELECT sum("value") FROM "Port" WHERE "type" = 'tiops' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "value" FROM "PortIO" WHERE "type" = 'tiops' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortIO
SELECT "value" FROM "PortIO" WHERE "type" = 'riops' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortIO
SELECT "value" FROM "PortIO" WHERE "type" = 'wiops' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortIO
SELECT "value" FROM "PortBW" WHERE "type" = 'rkb' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortBW
SELECT "value" FROM "PortBW" WHERE "type" = 'wkb' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortBW
SELECT "value" FROM "PortBW" WHERE "type" = 'tkb' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortBW
SELECT "value" FROM "PortRT" WHERE "type" = 'wms' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortRT
SELECT "value" FROM "PortRT" WHERE "type" = 'rms' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortRT
SELECT difference("value") FROM "Cache" WHERE "type" = 'delack' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY Cache,Diff
SELECT "value" FROM "HostQ" WHERE "type" = 'qls' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostQ
SELECT value FROM "Host" WHERE "type" = 'riops' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY Host
SELECT sum("value") FROM "Host" WHERE "type" = 'wiops' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY Host
SELECT "value" FROM "HostIO" WHERE "type" = 'iops' AND value >  0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostIO

SELECT "value" FROM "HostRT" WHERE "type" = 'wms' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostRT
SELECT "value" FROM "HostBW" WHERE "type" = 'mb' AND value > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "HostBW" WHERE "type" = 'rmb' AND "value" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "HostBW" WHERE "type" = 'wmb'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT max("value") FROM "SysCpu" WHERE "type" = 'util' AND SysCpu =~ /^0:/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "SysCpu" WHERE "type" = 'util' AND SysCpu =~ /^1:/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "SysCpu" WHERE "type" = 'util' AND SysCpu =~ /^2:/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "SysCpu" WHERE "type" = 'util' AND SysCpu =~ /^2:/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "SysCpu" WHERE "type" = 'util' AND SysCpu =~ /^3:/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
